name: Bait Weapons
author: justin
info: Add additional function to the bait item with these 4 new bait types.
description:
Some new bait items envisioned by SkyLizardGirl in this thread, https://www.purezc.ne...showtopic=66234

- Poison bait delivers damage to enemies that eat the bait
- Sleep bait puts enemies that eat it to sleep
- Mine bait explodes when triggered by enemies
- Baitchu, bait that moves away from Link.  No other flashy funciton, but it could easily be mashed with one of the other new bait types.

Update:  added the baitchu!
setup: std.zh and ffcscript.zh are required.detailed setup instructions included with the code.
